# <a name="compiler-error-cs0015"></a><span data-ttu-id="ebc7e-102">編譯器錯誤 CS0015</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ebc7e-102">Compiler Error CS0015</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ebc7e-103">類型 'type' 的名稱過長</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ebc7e-103">The name of type 'type' is too long</span></span>  
  
 <span data-ttu-id="ebc7e-104">使用者定義類型的完整名稱必須少於 1024 個字元，包括句號。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ebc7e-104">The fully qualified name of a user-defined type must have fewer than 1024 characters, including the periods.</span></span>  
  
 <span data-ttu-id="ebc7e-105">下列範例會產生 CS0015：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ebc7e-105">The following sample generates CS0015:</span></span>  
  
```csharp  
// CS0015.cs  
  
// Remove a C from one of the namespace names or the class name to resolve the error by  
// reducing the number of characters in the qualified class name to fewer than 1024.  
  
namespace CC  
{  
    // The following namespace name has 510 characters.  
    namespace   
    {  
        // The following class name has 510 characters. The qualified class name,    
        // CC.CCC510chars…C.CCCC510chars…C (namespace.namespace.class), has 1024   
        // characters, which causes compiler error CS0015.  
        public class   
        {  
            public static void Main()  
            {  
            }  
        }  
    }  
}  
```
